archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.6c: c) restricting access to the virtual server management console (or equivalent) to a limited number of authorised individuals (e.g. virtual server administrators)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
